foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, der der zweite gewirkte Zauber in diesem Zug ist.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je vois où vous voulez en venir. Cela ne me plaît pas. » —Dierk, geistmage

foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé qui est le deuxième sort lancé ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: "So cos'hai intenzione di fare. E non mi piace." —Dierk, mago dei geist
foreignData.name: Senno di Poi
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio che è la seconda lanciata in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「なるほどお前の狙いは読めたぞ。 気に食わんな。」 ――霊魔道士、ディールク

foreignData.text: このターンで２つ目に唱えられた呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。

foreignData.flavorText: "네가 뭘 하려는지 다 보여. 마음에 안 드는군." —심령술사 디어크
foreignData.name: 넘겨 짚기
foreignData.text: 이 턴에 발동된 두 번째 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Já sei onde você quer chegar com isso... E não gosto nada dessa ideia." — Dierk, geisteomago
foreignData.name: Antecipação
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo que seja a segunda mágica conjurada neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Я вижу, к чему ты стремишься. И мне это не нравится». — Дьерк, маг привидений

foreignData.flavorText: 「我知道你想用那个做啥。 我不同意。」 ～游魂法师第尔克

foreignData.flavorText: 「我知道你想用那個做啥。 我不同意。」 ～遊魂法師第爾克

name: Second Guess
originalText: Counter target spell that's the second spell cast this turn.

rulings.text: Second Guess can’t be cast unless the spell it targets is the second spell cast this turn.

It doesn’t matter if the first spell cast that turn has resolved yet or not. It also doesn’t matter how many spells have been cast after the second one, as long as the second spell cast is still on the stack.

Most spells and abilities that copy a spell create that copy on the stack. These copies are not cast and won’t count toward the number of spells cast that turn. However, a few (like Isochron Scepter’s ability) instruct you to copy a spell and “cast the copy.” These spells are cast and will count toward the number of spells cast that turn.

text: Counter target spell that's the second spell cast this turn.
